title: Low Poly Houses Mega Pack
description: Low Poly Houses Mega Pack of different sizes and shapes, optimized for any of your projects! Best solution for creating your own entertaining projects like games.
longDescription:
A total of 357 models in the package:


Village Low Poly Houses:

Individual cottages without exterior

Small, Medium, Big Cottages, Modern, Modern with Pool Cottages, Two, Three Storey Houses, Gothic Houses, Cute Houses, Cottage with Veranda, Thee Storey House with Attic, Umbrellas, Chair, Fountain, Lamp, Lawns with Lamps, Postbox, Pools, Sofas, Tables, Gothic Fence, Modern Fence, Pillars, White Fences, Wood Fence, Stone Fence, Different trees, Bushes and Grass, Bake, Barn, Bath, Dog House, Veranda


Shops Low Poly Houses:

Bakery, Burger Cafe, Butcher Shop, Candy Store, Chees Shop, Cofee House, Fish Shop, Flower Shop, Juice Smoothie Shop, Pizzeria, Supermarket, Toy Strore, Sushi Market, Ice Cream Truck, Popcorn Cart, Various Trees, Plants, Trees Places, Potted Tree, Flowers, Bushed, Bench, Fence, Tables, Chairs, Baloons, Flower Stand


Factories Low Poly Houses:

Bakery, Brewery, Confectionery, Feed Factory, Foundry, Furniture Factory, Garment Factory, Ice Cream Factory, Jewelry Factory, Milk Palnt, Mine, Paper Mill, Plastics Factory, Power Plant, Sawmill, Sugar Factory, Additional environment elements and mechanisms for factories (Governance Mechanisms, Boxes, Remote Controls, Chests, Bags, Natural Resources, Electrical Equipments, Electrical Appliances, Loader Car, Jewelry, Foods, Woods, Bottles etс)


Churches Low Poly Houses:

Various shapes and colors Buddhist Temples, Catholic Temples, Mosques, Orthodox Temples, Synagogue, Various Trees, Plants, Trees Places, Sakura Tree, Potted Tree, Palm, Bench, Fence, Fountains, Lantern, White Fench, Torii


Lunapark Low Poly:

Air Baloon, Autodrom, Bouncy Castle, Cars, Carousels, Circus Tents, Cups, Ferris Wheels, Horse Carousel, House of Fear, Locomotive, Cafe, Ice Cream, Popcorn, Corn, Cotton Candy, Tickets Sales, Arch, Benches, Chair, Flashlights, Lamposts, Stones, Tables, Tile Roasds, Tombstones, Trash Can, Playgrond, Dry Wood, Fir Trees, Round Tree


Sport Low Poly Grounds:

Archery, Baseball, Football, Golf fields, Archer Targets, Bars, Basketball Ring, Benches, Crossbars, Golf Flag, Half Pipe, Quarterpipes, Grindbox, Fanboxes, Skate Rail, Spine, Barbells, Bench Pumping Biceps, Bench Breast Pumping, Dumbbells, Punching Bags, Rack Barbells, Roman Chairs, Sports Bench, Squat Rack, Tennis Net, Tennis Tablet, Crossbars, Workout Complex, Basketball Court, City Park, Exercise Ground, Playgrounds, Swiming Pool, Skate park, Table Tennis Court, Tennis Courts, Volleyball Court, Workout Court, Children Houses, Play Complexes, Sandbox, Slide Children Round, Slide Children Straight, Swing Board, Swing Chains, Benches, Fountain, Lamppost, Trash Can, Trees, Fir Trees



Additional Information:

Package contain 1 universal texture 256px in .png format, so you can change the colors.

The models are between 5 and 1542 verts, total number of all 33159 verts.

This product supports Lumen for Unreal Engine 5.0+

Here is the instruction for using Lumen
technicalDetails:
